short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With just one click, this extension allows you to reverse the order of videos in your YouTube playlists

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Youtube Playlist Reverser is a powerful Chrome extension designed for YouTube users who want more control over their playlist viewing experience. With just one click, this extension allows you to reverse the order of videos in your YouTube playlists. Say goodbye to scrolling all the way to the bottom to watch the latest videos - now you can easily start from the most recent ones!

NOTE:  If you have any suggestions, please contact the developer 
 derek39576@gmail.com  , thanks!

UPDATE(v0.0.4):  Fix the bug about "the playback order was not reversed after reversing the list".
UPDATE(v0.0.3):  Fix the bug about "when playlist goes to the next video automatically,  the order is set back to normal".
UPDATE(v0.0.2):  Fix the display effect of the 'R' button in dark mode.
